alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 11:43PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Allegan and southern Ottawa Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm between Port Sheldon and Holland State Park, or 8 miles northwest of Holland, moving east-southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holland... Hudsonville... Zeeland... Beechwood... Holland SP... Hamilton... Port Sheldon... Burnips... Drenthe... Castle Park... Saugatuck Dunes SP... Jamestown... Vriesland... Olive Center... Macatawa... West Olive... Overisel... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
